title: Riot WAY overshot Azir's nerf...
body:
Now the Shuriman Birdman is back to 38% win rate on average.......

His W AA range used to be 400 which may have been a little overpowered at early levels, which is why I think Riot should ONLY nerf it at early levels.
I propose that Rito buff Azir (still a nerf to what he used to be) this way:
Soldier's AA Range scales by:
At Lvl 1 - 325
Past Lvl6 - 350
Past Lvl11 - 375
Past Lvl 16 - 400

That way he actually scales into late game and have the late game damage of a regular APC...

What do you guys think?

I personally love the Azir nerfs!! 

Azir is my favourite and main champ, and i was so sick of his 62% ban rate, now no one plays him which is awesome for the few true diehard Azir mains, when you win with Azir now you feel like you have accomplished something instead of just being satisfied that you won cos you played an op champ, i like Azir to be something special that when people see they think "oh cool an Azir" just like with Urgot or Trundle instead of the 
"oh god not another one" that we get with WW and co.

As a diehard azir player, I agree that he is unplayable now, there were so many other things to tweak on him but they destroyed his teamfighting just because his laning phase was a bit unbearable for some players.
